data.message: Oh for pity sake here’s a thought shall we all go back to a good old fashioned Christmas 🎄 with a let me think 🤔 oh yer a old fashioned Father Christmas maybe visit though are city’s  , on a kind of sleigh , or shall we all be in the good old USA 🇺🇸 , 1st it good old fashioned duck apple 🍎 gone out the window with the trick or treating not a bob apple 🍎 in sight , and now everyone’s up in arm,s because the holidays are coming big coke - cola truck not coming to there town sorry mean there city just need to wish you all Merry Christmas & not a happy holidays !!!
